alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 9:34PM EST until March 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Recent heavy rainfall in the Patoka River basin has caused the river to rise. At Princeton, the river is forecast to crest in minor flooding late this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 18.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
